Design-01.Description: This is a solid accent stripe with your custom text. The text (yellow 'TEXT' in image) can be left off, cut out, or a contrasting color.

Design-02.Description: This solid C-Pillar accent stripe has a thin pinstripe (red in image) around the inner perimeter. It also has the option of text (yellow 'CUSTOM TEXT' in image) in either a contrasting color or cut out.

Design-03.Description: This accent stripe is great for adding that contrast to your C-pillar. This stripe has half a pinstripe (red in image) to highlight the accent. The text (yellow 'CUSTOM TEXT' in image) is optional and can be either cutout or a coordinating color.

Design-04.Description: This thick outline accent stripe is a subtle but impacting look. The Text (red 'CUSTOM TEXT' in image) can be in an alternating color.
